comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown out when preview the attached design file.

Build number:
2.2.0.v20070508-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1. Preview the attached design file, and enter value for parameter.

Expected result:
No exception is thrown out.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.
